Installation¶

Installing from PyPI¶

pip install autohandshake

IMPORTANT: Web Browser Requirements¶

Autohandshake relies on an automated driver for Google Chrome. You therefore must have Chrome installed in order to use this package. You can download the latest version of Chrome here: https://www.google.com/chrome/.
